body:
Exec  SP210_Orgatex_GetData_DyeLots @DyeLot = 'KB-13166', @ReDye= 1

SELECT * FROM  IT01_ReceteM RM Where RM.ReceteNo Like '%P.13111TAMİR %'

SELECT D.ReceiptNo,* FROM IT210_Dyelots D Where D.ReceiptNo Like '%P.13111TAMİR %'

SELECT PRD.Durumu,PRD.IsEmriNo,* FROM IT05_PartiRotaD PRD
INNER JOIN IT05_UretimPartileri UP On UP.UretimPartiID = PRD.UretimPartiID
Where UP.ReceteID = 28076 And PRD.Durumu  =0

SELECT DR.UretimPartiID,* FROM   IT210_Dyelot_Recipe DR Where  DR.UretimPartiID IN
(
36841,
36840,
36839,
36685,
36683
)

SELECT D.ReceiptNo,D.UretimPartiID,* FROM IT210_Dyelots D Where D.UretimPartiID
IN
(
36841,
36840,
36839,
36685,
36683
)



select o.name AS Object_Name,o.type_desc
    FROM sys.sql_modules        m 
        INNER JOIN sys.objects  o ON m.object_id=o.object_id
    WHERE m.definition Like '%ReceiptNo%'
    ORDER BY 2,1


	SELECT ITBase.* FROM (SELECT M.PlanID, M.IsEmriNo, M.UretimPartiID, M.ReceteVar, M.IsReceteAtandi, M.UretimPartiTipID, M.ProsesID, M.UretimPartiNo, M.PartiSiraNo, M.MakinaNo, M.UrunKodu, M.UrunAdi, M.RenkKodu, M.RenkAdi, M.EtiketRenkKodu, M.PartiKg, M.PartiMt, M.ReceteMiktar_Kg, M.IsEmriAdedi, M.CozeltiMiktari, A0.CozeltiHesapKodu As lkpCozeltiHesapTipID, M.ReceteNo, M.FlotteOrani, M.ReceteAdi, A1.FlotteOranHesapTipKodu As lkpFlotteOranHesapTipID, M.ReceteID, M.MasterReceteNo, M.MasterReceteAdi, M.ReceteNotlar, M.PartiSayisi, M.AddDate, M.PartiDurumID, M.RenkID, M.CozeltiHesapTipID, M.MasterReceteID, M.PRMDDurumAdi, M.Durumu, M.Tipi, M.FlotteOranHesapTipID, M.HamGirisMt, M.HamGirisKg, M.AddUser, M.IsEmriTipAdi, M.RowColor, M.ReceteAtamaZamani, M.ReceteAtayan, M.IsReceteTuketim, M.ProsesKodu
From PV05_AcikPartiler_KumasBoya M 
Left Outer Join  (Select * From IT01_CozeltiHesapTipleri) A0 On M.CozeltiHesapTipID=A0.CozeltiHesapTipID
Left Outer Join  (Select * From IT01_FlotteOraniHesaplamaTipleri) A1 On M.FlotteOranHesapTipID=A1.FlotteOranHesapTipID) ITBase 
 Where (Durumu< 4) And (UretimPartiNo IN ('KB-13112', 'KB-13164', 'KB-13166', 'KB-13165', 'KB-13110')) Order By IsEmriNo DESC
